html:
Economics and Laws for Managers

You will learn how to apply economics to make informed business decisions through the study of key microeconomic and macroeconomic principles. You will learn to apply economic analysis to different personal, business and societal situations. The knowledge you will gain will be your most reliable guide in the understanding market and firm behaviour, and government decisions.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of key economic concepts and principles. [Knowledge & Understanding, Learning]

+  Understand and apply basic statistics and understand how these can be important for economic analysis. [Analysis and Application]

+  Apply economic analysis to different business and/or societal situations. [Problem Solving & Application]

+  Evaluate and analyse arguments and scenarios and apply the law, drawing reasoned conclusions. [Analysis and Application]

Module Content:
